# Basel problem

pyBasel.py 	Basel problem, pyhton implementation.
cBasel.c 	Basel problem, c implementation.

## Info
https://es.wikipedia.org/wiki/Problema_de_Basilea

## Run

Python:

```python pyBasel.py```

C:

```gcc cBasel.c -o cBasel```

```./cBasel```
